verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: his deal with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un will save tens of millions of people from a potential nuclear war] . [ARGM-TMP: Now he] [ARGM-ADV: just]
